webDeveloperIntern.title: Web Developer Intern
description: Developed responsive and dynamic web pages using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript.
Worked with MySQL for database management, including queries and data manipulation.
Collaborated with colleagues and mentors, enhancing problem-solving and teamwork skills.
Applied version control using Git and GitHub to manage project versions and track changes.

businessAnalyticsIntern.title: Business Analytics Intern
description: - Applied SQL and Microsoft Excel for data processing and analysis.
- Conducted exploratory data analysis on retail data to identify key insights.
- Created an interactive Tableau dashboard to visualize data and results.

itSupportSpecialist.title: Technical Support Specialist
description: Provided daily IT support to staff for issues related to printers, internet, and email.
Set up new user accounts and managed email addresses.
Performed minor maintenance and conducted hardware tests on PCs, monitors, and routers.
